1: bcom ldan <error-prone>'dod</error-prone> chags che//'dod chags kun la rjes chags <error-prone>phyir//rdo</error-prone> rje sems dpa' de nyid <error-prone>kyang //sna</error-prone> tshogs dmar po 'bar ba'i <error-prone>'od//de la</error-prone> ji ltar dbang bskur ba'i shes pa yin
2: <error-prone>zhe na/thod</error-prone> phreng dbu rgyan las gzhan <error-prone>ni//khams</error-prone> gsum la ni dbu rgyan <error-prone>med//thod</error-prone> pa'i phreng <error-prone>ba'i dbu</error-prone> rgyan ni//rdo rje sems dpa' bdag <error-prone>mngon</error-prone> bskyed//khams gsum las ni rin <error-prone>chen</error-prone> <error-prone>gzhan//</error-prone>
3: sangs rgyas rin <error-prone>chen</error-prone> 'dra ba <error-prone>med//sangs</error-prone> rgyas thams cad rin chen ces//dbu rgyan de yis rdo rje 'dzin//de nas <error-prone>ji</error-prone> ltar <error-prone>sems</error-prone> dpa'i skyil mo krung yin zhe <error-prone>na/yan</error-prone> lag g.yas pas <error-prone>mnyam</error-prone>
4: gnon pas//g.yon pa'i yan lag <error-prone>gzir</error-prone> nas su//de yi sems dpa'i skyil krung can//rdo rje <error-prone>snying</error-prone> po <error-prone>gtso bo'i</error-prone> gtso//de nas ji ltar rdo rje sems dpa'i <error-prone>lha</error-prone> mo la sogs pa'i de bzhin nyid
5: kyi shes pa yin zhe na/kun mchog shin tu 'bigs pas na//dngos grub thams cad bde ba'i <error-prone>mchog/kun</error-prone> mchog rnam rgyal bkra shis pas//thams <error-prone>cad dbang</error-prone> <error-prone>phyug</error-prone> che ru 'phags//grub
6: rnams de bzhin phun sum tshogs//dga' ba de bzhin gtso mo <error-prone>bdag/rdo</error-prone> rje lha mo tshogs phyag rgya//rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gzugs yin//de nas ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
7: kyi gsang <error-prone>ba</error-prone> chen po'i de nyid lnga yin <error-prone>zhe na/me</error-prone> long khrag <error-prone>'thung</error-prone> zhes bya rnams//mnyam pa nyid la gar dbang <error-prone>mchog/so</error-prone> sor rtog la nyi ma <error-prone>ste//bya ba</error-prone> la <error-prone>ni</error-prone> rta mchog <error-prone>dang //chos</error-prone> kyi <error-prone>dbyings</error-prone> la sangs
8: rgyas ni//thub chen rnam par snang mdzad do//ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid <error-prone>ni//'dod</error-prone> chags chen po bde ba che//gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin <error-prone>dri//ro</error-prone> dang reg <error-prone>bya de</error-prone> bzhin yang //rdo rje sems
